definition: to expel/to urge on/to drive/to run quickly
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Check the initialization status of the driver.
sentences.chinese: 檢查驅動程序的初始狀態。

sentences.english: This isolation level is defined when the driver and its libraries are loaded.
sentences.chinese: 這個隔離級別是在驅動程序及其庫載入的時候定義的。

sentences.english: The device driver got stuck in an infinite loop. This usually indicates.
sentences.chinese: 設備驅動程序已經陷入無限死循環中這通常表示。

sentences.english: It should be quite obvious by now when you would use this driver.
sentences.chinese: 現在，您應該非常清楚何時適合使用這個驅動程序。

sentences.english: This device driver should perform some diagnostics of the device itself.
sentences.chinese: 這個設備驅動程序需要對設備本身執行一些診斷操作。

sentences.english: This method can also be used to design event-driven programs based on DOS.
sentences.chinese: 同時也可應用於DOS下消息驅動程序的設計。

sentences.english: Drivers can use the default workqueue provided by the kernel.
sentences.chinese: 驅動程序可以使用內核提供的缺省工作隊列。

sentences.english: WHQL signing of the NDIS Driver – NDIS driver has been certified with Microsoft Certification.
sentences.chinese: NDIS驅動程序獲得了微軟的數字簽名。
打印機驅動程序管理例程。

sentences.english: Your moni tor tells you what to do to get the driver you want to add.
sentences.chinese: 監視器會告訴爲得到你要增加的驅動程序你該做什麼。

sentences.english: The Count is the gent in the Homburg, on the right of the driver.
sentences.chinese: 計數是根特，在洪堡，在右邊的驅動程序。
串行接口，8位LED顯示驅動程序。

sentences.english: Alge-Timing Timy USB Driver helps ensure the correct functionality of Timy devices.
sentences.chinese: USB驅動程序有助於確保微小器件的正確功能。

sentences.english: Color match file corrupt; re-install driver.
sentences.chinese: 顏色調配文件損壞，請重新安裝驅動程序。

sentences.english: BSP and driver design of the interconnecting gateway are the emphases of the dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網關的BSP和驅動程序設計是本論文的重點。

sentences.english: The motion driven program is the key part to guarantee pointing accurate.
sentences.chinese: 該系統的運動驅動程序是保證點樣精度的關鍵部分。
